programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Senegal - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 4 - Nature’s Heroes: Senegal - Part 1
programme.desc: For this new episode, Yann Arthus-Bertrand travels through Senegal to encounter men and women who dedicate their lives to preserving the environment. One of the major ecological stakes of the country is fishing and the mangrove ecosystem which, like in some many other parts of the world, faces major threats. Yann Arthus-Bertrand presents the struggle of Haidar El Ali, chosen among one of the world’s most active ecologists. He creates protected marine areas and reforests the disappeared mangrove of his country. He’s managed to convince thousands of Senegalese to plant with him ten million mangrove trees.

programme.title: Spicy kitchen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julie's Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - Spicy kitchen
programme.desc: Today, Julie takes us on a tour of spices and aromatic plants. Spices are a call to travel, to faraway lands and to the unknown. In the kitchen, they bear witness to our relationship with others, reflecting our vision of the world. Julie's journey will introduce us to the famous black pepper, thanks to Erwann de Kerros, an insatiable pepper seeker. Aromatic plants will also be in the spotlight, as we pick them with Edouard Loubet in the Luberon...

programme.title: Paddle Yoga
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Paddle Yoga
programme.desc: ValKahl tries out the addictive and zen yoga lesson on water on a paddleboard with YOGAqua, in Marina Del Rey. After learning to make some delightful and healthy wrap in restaurant KYE’S, she does sightseeing in Malibu Wine Hikes, the organic grapes garden behind Malibu’s famous beaches. Along the way, she can’t resist biting a mustard plant, feeding and ‘french kissing’ Stanley, the celebrity giraffe. She later harvests some fresh organic vegetables in Saddle Rock Garden!

programme.desc: Never thought yoga and chocolate could be a healthy combination? You were wrong! After testing this chocolate tan, we'll be sweating it out at Tantris, the three-story yoga studio in the heart of Hollywood.

programme.title: Masashi Hirao
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bonsai Bad Boy - Season 1 - Masashi Hirao
programme.desc: In 2003, Masashi Hirao became the last apprentice of Japan's great Bonsai master Saburo Kato. Before Saburo-san died he passed on to his apprentice a seemingly impossible mission: to prevent the 1000 year old art from dying-out in the face of a rapidly changing world and achieve his master’s vision of bringing peace to the world through bonsai. Masashi’s early efforts are dogged by many failures but combining his master’s guidance & modern instincts he sets out to travel the world and discover the way, drawing on innovative trends in contemporary art.

programme.title: Tough pregnancies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Family - Season 1 - Tough pregnancies
programme.desc: Clara and Gianni are worried, since a pregnancy with twins is always riskier. She’s due in two months, and has already undergone two medical interventions. Kim, nineteen, is fine physically, but she has to face her family’s criticism: she still lives at her parent’s, and the absence of the father-to-be worries them a great deal. Coralie would rather be safe than sorry, and meets with a prenatal consultant. Her nightmare: being turned down for an epidural procedure... Nathalie and Naoufel are looking at the bright side of life and are chilling on granddaddy’s boat, before letting themselves enjoy a family photo shoot.

programme.desc: He takes us to Petra in Jordan. We discover how the Nabataeans became specialists in collecting rainwater, which they managed meticulously. Then, we find ourselves in Las Vegas, on the verge of a shortage, and in Amman, Jordan, to discover the daily difficulties linked to the shortage and rationing of water. In Israel, the Dead Sea is disappearing. Due to intensive agriculture, the Jordan River and other rivers no longer supply it with enough water. In France, the Loire is for nature lovers, today a multitude of species have come to recolonise the river, including the famous wild salmon. In Jordan, in the red desert of Wadi Rum, we meet Khaleel Maiteq, who shares with us his life and that...

programme.title: Journey To The West
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bonsai Bad Boy - Season 1 - Journey To The West
programme.desc: Finding no way forward in Japan, Masashi looks to break through overseas. But although bonsai had spread widely in his master’s time, it seems doomed to wither if someone doesn’t do something to make the art form fun and relevant in a fast paced modern world. Finally on a trip to Italy, Masashi Hirao may have found a way to break the wall and build a bridge to new audiences. He determines to topple a 1000 years of tradition and turn the art of bonsai into a pop culture phenomenon, combining it with other art forms and focused on the process of creation as much as on the result.

programme.title: Last preps
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Family - Season 1 - Last preps
programme.desc: Clara and Gianni’s boys are born! But they came in a little bit early, and have been admitted in neonatal resuscitation... Coralie and Florent are still walking on clouds as they wait for their daughter, Lena. So are Nathalie and Naoufel, who arrange a tour of the future baby’s bedroom. Things are still tense between Kim and her parents. Her father blames here for having left school too early and the family makes no effort to hide their dislike of Pierre, the would-be father, who is still a no-show. They go as far as opposing Kim’s preferred choice for the future boy’s name, since it was his father that came up with the idea...

programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Senegal - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 4 - Nature’s Heroes: Senegal - Part 2
programme.desc: For this new episode, Yann Arthus-Bertrand travels through Senegal to encounter men and women who dedicate their lives to preserving the environment. One of the major ecological stakes of the country is fishing and the mangrove ecosystem which, like in some many other parts of the world, faces major threats. Yann Arthus-Bertrand presents the struggle of Haidar El Ali, chosen among one of the world’s most active ecologists. He creates protected marine areas and reforests the disappeared mangrove of his country. He’s managed to convince thousands of Senegalese to plant with him ten million mangrove trees.

programme.desc: We find ourselves in Israel in the Negev desert, Elaine is looking for solutions to combat desertification. The object of her research: trees, which consume little water. In Mali, we meet the Dogon: the desert farmers. He shows us his people's recipes for managing water. In this part of Mali, where it almost never rains. In Palestine, the village of Wadi Fukeen. A village where farmers use an irrigation and water-sharing system that is over 300 years old and based on respect and trust. And in Gaza, Palestine, where specialists are fighting to save Palestinian children made ill by unsafe water. In the Jordan Valley, where three countries in conflict face the same problems: the lack of...

programme.title: The taste of honey
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julie's Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - The taste of honey
programme.desc: Honey was the first sweet condiment in history! It has also been known and consumed as a remedy since Antiquity. In France, we find an infinite variety of honey: acacia, chestnut, fir, rosemary, orange, spruce, oak, linden or lavender... We'll cross forests, fields and even towns, as bees also forage in urbanized areas. We'll then cook up emblematic recipes like Vercel gingerbread. Finally, we'll discover the European dark bee. Protecting this 80-million-year-old bee has become the spearhead of some passionate beekeepers.

This place in the heart of Ojai's nature combines the best of California production with an unexpected 'French touch' by bringing his equipment from France. We then visit 'The Turtle Conservatory Center', a reserve where rare species of turtles gather from around the world. Respectful of their needs and living conditions, this center is a haven of peace for turtles and Val, who will definitely come back here on her day off.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bonsai Bad Boy - Season 1 - Mainstream VS Indie
programme.desc: Masashi returns from Italy with a new sense of purpose and direction. He will pioneer a radical path as a Bonsai performer, using his childhood powers of concentration and speed to create a new art form and drag bonsai in front of a new generation. Masashi’s bold style makes him a star in Japan. But as his following in Japan grows, Masashi pushes forward with his broader mission - to spread Bonsai culture around the world. He accepts an invitation to take his radical new performance art to Penang, Malaysia, where he discovers new insights into the power of bonsai to bring peace.

programme.title: Meet the parents

programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Canada - Quebec - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 4 - Nature’s Heroes: Canada - Quebec - Part 1
programme.desc: Canada is the second largest country in the world by land mass and contains amazing natural resources: 7% of the Earth’s drinking water is spread over the country’s thousands of lakes. Forests cover 45% of the territory. Yann Arthus-Bertrand goes off to discover these resources with those whose job it is to protect them. He takes a look at the ecological balance sheet of the world’s eighth-largest economic power.

programme.title: The Challenge of Leadership
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bonsai Bad Boy - Season 1 - The Challenge of Leadership
programme.desc: After years of struggling Masashi Hirao feels he is finding clues to bonsai’s future, changing bonsai’s image of tired old men pruning trees. He has a radical idea to challenge tradition further at the 3-yearly international Setouchi Triennale, the largest art event in Japan. Masashi will stage an Avant Garde personal exhibition as well as a ground-breaking solo performance climaxing with a collaboration with a radical, anti-modernisation punk band, in direct contradiction of Masashi’s mission. It will be a bonsai showdown. Tradition and modernisation clashing head on. Is it possible to pursue change, and preserve tradition? Masashi is in unexplored territory.

programme.title: Saviour or Saboteur
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bonsai Bad Boy - Season 1 - Saviour or Saboteur
programme.desc: Masashi Hirao is building an entirely new brand, and a new art form: performance bonsai. His quest to push boundaries brings fresh challenges, which come to the fore as he heads to Kuala Lumpur to team up with unconventional Malaysian realist painter, Lee Mar. Little goes to plan and the event strains both artist’s talents to the limit. But the challenge is nothing compared to the test when his radical approach wins him an invitation to the international Bonsai Without Borders Summit in China: 75 world-class Bonsai Masters from 35 countries. The bonsai bad boy has officially arrived on the world stage. It is the ultimate test in front of the most critical audience possible.

programme.desc: In contrast to artificial toboggan runs, natural toboggan runs consist of mountain roads and trails. Natural track tobogganing requires a completely different technique than on an artificial track. At the finish, hundredths of a second decide whether you win or lose.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2019 - Ordino Arcalis (AND)
programme.desc: It's that time of the season again when points mean everything: racing for the world title, qualifying for the final in Verbier and the 2020 season. The stage is set for what is sure to be a hard-fought competition in Ordino Arcalís

programme.title: Episode 49
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 49

programme.title: Open Faces 2025 - YETI Freeride Junior World Championships Kappl/Paznaun - LIVE Part 1
programme.desc: Open Faces 2025 - YETI Freeride Junior World Championships Kappl/Paznaun - LIVE Part 1

programme.title: WOF 2024 #05: Reconnect One - USA
programme.desc: Sarka and Cheryl, who haven't seen each other in years, have decided to reunite and embark on a tour of their own. Having once traveled together on the contest scene for over 15 years, life led them to different corners of the West Coast of America.

programme.title: Swissway to Heaven
programme.desc: Swissway to Heaven is a film about multi-pitch climbing in the swiss alps.The dokumentary portraits the history and evolution of climbing in Swizerland aswell as Cedric Lachat's adventure climbing all 5 big walls of the swiss alps.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #06: GKA World Tour Season Wrap Up
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour has just wrapped up a record-breaking year packed with drama and excitement. The stars of the sport pushed kiteboarding to new highs in 2023 in their single-minded quest for world titles.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - World's Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official World's Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes' veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what I'm going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 1, Martinique
programme.desc: The Strongman Champions League kicks off its 2014 season in Martinique.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 2, Germany FIBO Power
programme.desc: The second stage of 2014 Strongman champions League, in Cologne, Germany. 14 athletes from 12 different countries battled through six events on the second stop

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Fabricio Santos De Jesus was introduced to Judo as a child while he was still living in Brazil. He was also introduced to Capoeira, becoming Champion of Brazil and International Capoeira Champion. He has been able to transfer his knowledge of the control of movement and is now recognized for this knowledge as a coach in MMA community. Hard Knocks Fighter Jess Elverum, among others, using his teachings to expand their flexibility and dexterity, becoming more fluid and calm in movement.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coaches in fight sport are at times an underrated but yet intergral part of an athlete's success. What makes them give up their day, weeks and years to help their fighters be the best in the world? This episode features Jaclyn Madarasz as we delve into the life of a coach.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Josh Lee is highly respected in the MMA community for his wrestling skills. In this episode, we follow Josh throughout his day, and see some well known HK fighters who have trained under him, such as Jess Elverum. It is Josh's hope that his ability to transfer his knowledge of wrestling will make big difference in his students' fighting. He would also love to see more people take up wrestling.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Spartan Events is into its third year of running its hugely successful promotion, Shock N Awe. With top match making throughout the fight cards, they have been touted as some of the biggest and toughest fights in the UK. Shock N Awe consistently delivers hard hitting action, also going one step further by adding in the personalities from MC Ricky Wright, Ring Girls Poppy and Alex and as well as the huge UK fight teams!

programme.title: Cesar 911
programme.desc: Cesar Millan takes on an aggressive Great Dane that’s in danger of being put down, and a Maltese mix, whose aggressive behavior is driving a wedge between two sisters.

programme.title: Better Human Better Dog
programme.desc: The Thompson pack is recovering from past trauma at the hands of an abusive ex-husband. Now, the women have suffered another tragedy: coonhound Nyla has become explosively aggressive, accidentally killing one family dog and viciously attacking another.

programme.title: Better Human Better Dog
programme.desc: Cesar sets out to help a young couple's cantankerous Chihuahua, whose recent blindness makes him increasingly hostile to be around. And later, a family makes a desperate plea to Cesar to help them rein in their fast-growing and overexcited Belgian Malinois before he becomes too tough to tame.

programme.title: Better Human Better Dog
programme.desc: Cesar works with a Mexican breed close to his heart when he rehabilitates twin dogs whose over-excited behavior has put their owner at risk of eviction from her apartment building. Later, an actress turns to Cesar for help with an overprotective pint-sized pooch.

programme.title: Better Human Better Dog
programme.desc: Cesar helps a family of seven with their young Rottweiler, who's grown aggressive and territorial after a burglary at the family home. With help from his own pack, Cesar instructs the pet parents on techniques to exert leadership behavior and reestablish themselves atop the pack.

programme.title: Better Human Better Dog
programme.desc: Cesar helps a fearful family, which is still holding on to the pain of losing their first dog in a tragic accident, deal with their two-year-old Black Lab's similarly aggressive personality. And later, a young girl looks to Cesar for help when her emotional support puppy is causing chaos.

programme.title: Better Human Better Dog
programme.desc: Cesar helps a young couple's sensitive Australian cattle dog, whose severe separation anxiety has held hostage the lives of his pet parents. programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S04 : E26 Jodha Akbar S4 E26
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Mini Patel is back for a second attempt at the North East Regional title but hes competing against two young newcomers Tommy Banks and Chris Archer.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: It is the fish course and two chefs from the North East, Tommy and Mini, have very similar ingredients - both are cooking mackerel.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its the main course of the North East Region and overnight there has been a dramatic development. Its a tough and emotional day for the chefs.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: It is a highly emotional day for one of the chefs as he prepares a dish which is inspired by and a tribute to his own Great Briton, his late Grandfather.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today the two chefs are cooking for the judges Matthew Fort, Prue Leith and Oliver Peyton. Joining them is guest judge is John Williams MBE, the executive Head Chef at The Ritz, the only hotel to hold a royal warrant for banqueting.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: This week three top chefs from Northern Ireland are competing for a place in the National Finals. There are some varied and exciting starters, as the chefs get creative. And theres real shock and emotion as the veteran chef delivers his scores.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today the atmosphere in the kitchen gets even more competitive as the three chefs from Northern Ireland dish cook their fish courses.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: It is the main course and returning Chef Chris McGowan is feeling confident but part of his dish involves making his own venison sausages to serve with a venison rack, and getting it all done in time is straining his emotions.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The three chefs from Northern Ireland are cooking their desserts and one chef is on course for an historic score, he could beat his boss a veteran of GBM and achieve more marks than anyone has done throughout the history of the competition.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today is the head to head. The two highest scoring chefs from Northern Ireland are cooking for judges Oliver Peyton, Prue Leith and Matthew Fort who are joined by guest judge, restaurant critic and Editor-at-Large of the Independent, Amol Rajan.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: It's the National Finals of Great British Menu. The chefs will mark each course of the fellow chefs dishes; the average of their scores will be added to the judges scores. There are some shocks and surprises as the chefs opinions differ from the judges.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: It is day two of Great British Menus National Finals. Today the eight champions will cook their fish courses. Two chefs have reason to be confident after scoring tens from every judge in the heats. Can they deliver a perfect dish second time round?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: It is the National Finals of Great British Menu and main course day, the one course every chef wants to cook at the banquet. It is a nerve wracking day for three of the eight regional champions.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tim Shaw is the latest car nut to join the team, and he's been specially tasked with standing up for the beleaguered motorist. Jason Plato and Tiff Needell go head to head on the track to find out which car is fastest.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason & Tiff pit the new Ford Focus RS against Mitsubishi Evo X. Audi's new Lamborghini engined supercar, the R8 V10, is under scrutiny. Tom Ford examines the brand new Citroen C3 Picasso from the point of view of a truly 21st Century family man.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell meets some of the people whose lives have been blighted by a terror of driving. He then considers the latest solutions to the problem.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Where are your children safest - in a 4x4 or an MPV? Fifth Gear finds out with a spectacular 'worlds first' crash test between a Landrover Discovery and Renault Espace.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell tests the new MGTF. He finds it a better road car than the old MGL but it's still not a track day car. Quentin Willson reveals some ways people try to get off their speeding tickets.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato is given his toughest mission yet - to do one month's motoring in 24 hours. It's in a bid to give the new BMW 3 Series the ultimate road test.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell poses the question, "What's the best GT car you can buy for £90,000?" He tests the top contenders which both come from Stuttgart - the Mercedes SL55 AMG and the Porsche 911 Turbo.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: The most frequently asked motoring question is "What's quickest?" Fifth Gear go to a special test track on the Isle of Anglesey with six of the most desirable performance cars of the moment.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell takes two coupes onto the Fifth Gear track - the Mazda RX8 and Nissan 350Z. Vicki Butler-Henderson spends a day with Formula One star Lewis Hamilton. Tom Ford is the lucky man behind the wheel of the facelifted Mercedes SL63 AMG.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Adrian Simpson road tests the new Hyundai Coupé. It was massively praised by motoring journalists on its launch it Italy. They even likened the £14,000 South Korean car to a mini Ferrari 456.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki goes behind the scenes of famous Italian car designers Pininfarina - the people who have shaped every single Ferrari of the last 50 years. Tiff is joined by British rally star Mark Higgins in a test of two new SUVs with supercar power figures

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Legendary Hollywood stunt co-ordinator Vic Armstrong teaches Vicki Butler-Henderson, the same stunt he taught Tom Cruise. She has to hit a ramp perfectly to roll the car as a climax to the chase.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny and Vicki review two mighty 4x4's in one of the shows muddiest Dog Fights. Elsewhere, the team hit the road in the all-new Alpine A110 to find out what's changed since the first incarnation hit our streets back in 1961.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and motoring journalist Chris Harris put two track focused supercars through their paces - the Ferrari 458 Speciale and the Porsche 911 GT3. Tests involving agility, road manners and head to head racing will decide which is best.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: To celebrate 20 years of Fifth Gear, Jason Plato and Vicki Butler-Henderson get behind the wheel of some of the best cars to feature on the show 20 years ago and put them up against their modern alternatives.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny and Jason try to find a decent new car for just £10,000. Vicki checks out the new Lamborghini Urus, and the team find the biggest BMW ever made, the new X7.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny Smith is in Sweden testing the brand new Volvo S60 Polestar super saloon against its racing car cousin - the competition car of double Swedish Touring Car Champion Fredrick Ekblom.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff and Jason hold a knock-out tournament to see if the 570hp Mercedes SLS AMG can beat its rivals from Aston Martin, Bentley and Jaguar. Jonny meets Swedish rally legend Stig Blomquist for some ice driving lessons in the new Audi A1 Quattro.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson is in Italy testing the most powerful Ferrari ever made, the brand new 730bhp F12berlinetta, to the limit. Tiff and Jason are at the track with the two cheapest hot hatches on sale - the Suzuki Swift and Renault Sport Twingo.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason and Karun discover the new version of the legendary Porsche 911, the Carrera 4S. Jonny checks the future of autonomous cars in South Korea.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato races two estates head to head. Vicki Butler-Henderson pits the new Pro-Ceed against the VW Golf. Jonny Smith picks up an amazing luxury car for £1000 or less. Tiff Needell runs Fifth Gear's most exciting car v bike race to date.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki is the first journalist in the world to drive the astonishing £150,000 Gibbs Aquada, an amphibious car that breaks the mould. Vicki tests it out on the open road and the ocean wave.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff tests this grand tourer's handling through the dramatic scenery of Snowdonia in Wales. Jason Plato tests the brand new £115,000 Aston Martin DB9 Volante, one of the fastest cabriolets on sale today.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: It's the ultimate showdown, a quarter mile drag between a Formula One car, a superbike and a racing powerboat to find out which is quickest.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Iwan accepts a stunt challenge from world famous precision driver Russ Swift; we observe supercars trying to beat the 0-62 world record; Jonny secretly repairs the potholes that local councils refuse to.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff heads to Anglesey for not one but two Shoot-Outs, the Porsche Cayenne goes head to head with the BMW X5 and the Renault Clio takes on the Honda Civic.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason pits the tiny Renault Sport Twingo 133 against the Renault 5 GT Turbo. Tom finds out Vauxhall's replacement for the Vectra. Tim relives the terror of his driving test to find out why fewer people than ever are passing their test.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell poses the question, "What's the best GT car you can buy for £90,000?" He tests the top contenders which both come from Stuttgart - the Mercedes SL55 AMG and the Porsche 911 Turbo.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson tries to crack 150mph as she makes an attempt on the Blindfolded Land Speed World Record. Can Vicki hold her nerve and set a new record for driving in a straight line?

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson finds out if an old Daihatsu Charade is the toughest car you can buy; Tom Ford drives the Honda CRV, the SUV that claims to be greener than a MINI Cooper.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson risks life and limb in the most dangerous car stunt of all - driving a car under a moving lorry. Jonny Smith tests the new Mercedes C Class and its revolutionary seat design.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Fifth Gear reconstructs one of the fastest-growing types of car crash in Britain; a terror that could turn a pleasant motorway journey into one of the most frightening rides of your life.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In this special episode of the programme we reveal the winners of the Fifth Gear Awards 2006. There will be prizes for Best Small Car, Best Family Car, Best Fast Car and the overall Car of the Year.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson attempts to drive flat out in Aston Martin's new Vanquish S. The 520bhp, £175,000-plus super-coupe accelerates from 0-60 in 4.8 seconds and is capable of over 200mph.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell tests he BMW M5, by driving from the UK to the famous Pau circuit in the South of France. Tom Ford tests the world's maddest car - the Ariel Atom.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson is in Anglesey for another Fifth Gear shoot-out. This week it's the Porsche Cayenne GTS against the BMW X5. Tom Ford drives the new C5 and Tiff Needell tests the new Subaru Impreza STi.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jon Bentley investigates how hitting a motorway crash barrier can make your car fly through the air. Jason Plato gives cricketer Kevin Petersen the chance to drive the Lamborghini Gallardo Spyder.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki finds out if the new 207 GTi is as exhilarating to drive as the 20 year old hot hatch the 205GTi; Fifth Gear conducts a fascinating world's first crash test.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason takes two sporty convertibles - the Mini Cooper Cabriolet and Mazda MX-5 onto the track for a hair-do busting shootout. Tim Shaw heads to a garage...with no mechanics! Tiff spends some quality time in the brand new Aston Martin V12 Vantage.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson has a mini-moto race against some of the biggest names in bike racing; Tom Ford tests the new Land Rover Freelander on Britain's most remote school run.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: The most frequently asked motoring question is "What's quickest?" Fifth Gear go to a special test track on the Isle of Anglesey with six of the most desirable performance cars of the moment.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki finds out which TV cop car is fastest, Jonny celebrates the 75th anniversary of the Deuce Coupe, the original Hot Rod; Tiff tests the Gumpert Apollo and Tom and Jonny build their own drift vehicles out of £600 Bedford Rascal vans.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tim Shaw is the latest car nut to join the team, and he's been specially tasked with standing up for the beleaguered motorist. Jason Plato and Tiff Needell go head to head on the track to find out which car is fastest.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In an astonishing series of experiments Tiff Needell and Vicki Butler-Henderson find out just how dangerous ordinary items can be, and how you can best keep them under control in our cars.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki is at the controls in a classic Ford v Vauxhall battle, two boy racer specials, the Fiesta ST and Corsa SRi, wage war to find out which is fastest. Tom journeys to the Arctic Circle to test the Volvo XC70, an estate car with four wheel drive.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny Smith goes on a rather expensive road trip - in a £250,000 Rolls Royce Phantom. Tom Ford is testing the new Porsche Cayenne Turbo.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson road tests the new performance version of Alfa Romeo's 156. She likes it and reckons it ranks alongside performance saloons from BMW, Subaru and Mitsubishi.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford and Jonny Smith enter a demolition derby in two unlikely vehicles, Reliant Robins. Tiff Needell tests the latest Porsche 911, the GT3RS. Vicki Butler-Henderson drives the new Vauxhall VXR8.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff drives the Lamborghini Gallardo Superleggera Jonny goes to meet another pioneer of alternative fuels - a cider farmer who uses rotten apples to produce methane that powers his Jaguar and Tom drives the £260,000 Rolls-Royce Drophead Coupe.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki tests two cars that are low, light and very fast - Lotus Exige S v Caterham CSR. Tom visits Spain to drive the Toyota Landcruiser. Jason Plato drives the Mercedes CLK63 Black. Tiff teaches Heston Blumenthal the art of powersliding.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson is joined by Norwegian rally prodigy Andreas Mikkelsen for a high octane motoring triathlon - race in a 200bhp off road buggy, perform an autotest in a Skoda Fabia hot hatch, and battle wheel to wheel in single seat race cars.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny and Jimmy head to S. Korea to discover how they made world-beating cars in just a few years. Jimmy revisits the original Bentley Blower and Jason hits the track in an Alpine A110.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: New presenter Ben Collins is put through his paces as the team challenge him to tame an 800bhp dragster. Tiff and Jason renew the fight between two super saloon adversaries. Vicki drives Bentley's new £180,000 Continental Supersports Convertible.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson learns the skills needed to drive in the Special Forces, from former Royal Marine sniper Aldo Kane.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and rally driver Mark Higgins set Olympic Skeleton Bob gold medallist Amy Williams and World Pentathlete champion Samantha Murray a track challenge. Expect car damage and the closest ever finish to a Fifth Gear celebrity contest.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki presents the Fifth Gear annual awards for best small, family and fast car, and the show's overall Car of the Year, while Tiff and Jason team up with Fifth Gear new boy Ben Collins to test three closely matched sports cars.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and Formula E driver Karun Chandhok race two supercar GTs worth over £400,000 between them, the Ferrari F12 and Aston Martin Vanquish. Jonny Smith looks at the ultimate British getaway car of the 1960's, the Mk2 Jaguar.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato gets behind the wheel of his favourite Porsches and puts them up against some iconic competition

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff offers a unique behind-the-scenes glimpse of the final British Touring Car Championship race of the year as Jason attempts to clinch the championship, Vicki reveals everything you need to know about Renault's sexy new convertible the Wind.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato is joined by former F1 driver Karun Chandhok as they pit a Honda Civic Type-R, a Seat Leon Cupra-R, a Renault Megane RS and a Audi S3 against one another to see who will be crowned king of the hot-hatches in an all-new Deathmatch

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason's in Italy to drive the most talked about hypercar of the year - the 730bhp Pagani Huayra. He's given an exclusive tour of how this incredible machine is made at the company's HQ, and lets the car off the leash on road and track.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny Smith goes on a rather expensive road trip - in a £250,000 Rolls Royce Phantom. Tom Ford is testing the new Porsche Cayenne Turbo.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: We find out what happens if you accidentally put diesel into a petrol engine, and follow Tiff Needell as he races an Aston Martin DBR9S.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson finds out if the new Fiat Panda 100HP is as quick as a Ferrari round a track, Jason Plato tries to crack 200mph on the public road in the £230,000 Brabus Rocket.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Quentin Willson, Tiff Needell, Vicki Butler-Henderson and Adrian Simpson visit the British International Motorshow. They look at some of the cars they didn't see at the recent Paris show.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff heads to Anglesey for not one but two Shoot-Outs, the Porsche Cayenne goes head to head with the BMW X5 and the Renault Clio takes on the Honda Civic.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tim Shaw is the latest car nut to join the team, and he's been specially tasked with standing up for the beleaguered motorist. Jason Plato and Tiff Needell go head to head on the track to find out which car is fastest.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: We all assume that driving around in a big SUV means we're protected and safe - but do you know what it would take to get one to topple over?

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason & Tiff pit the new Ford Focus RS against Mitsubishi Evo X. Audi's new Lamborghini engined supercar, the R8 V10, is under scrutiny. Tom Ford examines the brand new Citroen C3 Picasso from the point of view of a truly 21st Century family man.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford and Jonny Smith enter a demolition derby in two unlikely vehicles, Reliant Robins. Tiff Needell tests the latest Porsche 911, the GT3RS. Vicki Butler-Henderson drives the new Vauxhall VXR8.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki finds out which is quickest, the VW Golf GTi or Subaru Impreza WRX. Jonny proves there are still some amazing cars that you can buy for under £1500. Jason tests the Lotus Elise to find out if this is the finest car Lotus has ever produced.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Fifth Gear will be testing three of the most economical cars on the market. There's the petrol-powered Daihatsu Charade and the diesel-powered Citroen C2 and the "hybrid" Toyota Prius.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford takes puts the Grande Punto Abarth through its hot hatch paces. Tim Shaw finds out if it's possible to save huge amounts of money by servicing your car yourself. Bruno Senna joins the programme as a special guest presenter.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff indulges in an end of term treat a classic Fifth Gear shootout, featuring some classic hot hatches from the 1980s. Tim investigates the great diesel versus petrol debate. Jonny visits his idea of automotive hell at the Firecracker Banger meet.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford tests Nissan's new Micra. He finds it well-made and easy-to-drive. Adrian Simpson goes in search haunted cars. He starts by being very sceptical that haunted cars can exist at all.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jon Bentley investigates how hitting a motorway crash barrier can make your car fly through the air. Jason Plato gives cricketer Kevin Petersen the chance to drive the Lamborghini Gallardo Spyder.

programme.desc: Vicki takes the Focus RS and the Escort Cosworth to find out once and for all which handles best around a track. Jason drives the Grand Tourer and delivers his verdict whether the £78,000 asking price would represent money well spent.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tim Shaw tackles the horrible subject of car tax. Jason Plato meets Moto GP star James Toseland in another feature where Fifth Gear makes a sports stars dream come true. Tom Ford demonstrates the potential safety issues of convertibles.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki tests the Mercedes Vito X or the VW Transporter Sportline on the track to find out which is quickest. Jonny embarks on the 600 mile transcontinental trip in the BMW 635d. Tom drives the ultimate 4x4, the 12 tonne, 10 foot tall Unimog.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: We reveal the Best Cheap Car in Britain, meet the man who's giving away a free Ferrari to try and help sell his house, and a look round the country's ultimate supercar collection.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson finds out if an old Daihatsu Charade is the toughest car you can buy; Tom Ford drives the Honda CRV, the SUV that claims to be greener than a MINI Cooper.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell reports on fifth Gear's project to build a 200mph car. Last time we saw our Lotus it blew up in a cloud of smoke, but it's back, repaired, and even more modified.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell teams up with supermodel Jodie Kidd to race a Maserati at the Monza grand prix circuit in Italy. Jason Plato visits the Top Marques Monaco Motorshow.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell tests the new MGTF. He finds it a better road car than the old MGL but it's still not a track day car. Quentin Willson reveals some ways people try to get off their speeding tickets.

programme.desc: Jason and Tiff try to master the controls of the Red Dragon, a 1700 hp Monster Truck. Jonny drives the new Renault Megane. Tom tests BMW's premium luxury car, the 7 Series. Tom Cave - a 17 year old Welsh rally sensation challenges Vicki.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell is joined by Le Mans winner Guy Smith and former rally co-driver Tony Mason to do something that's not as ridiculous as it might sound - caravan racing.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and Vicki Butler-Henderson will be investigating what improvements mean in practice when they crash a brand new car head-on into a nine-year-old one.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason pits the tiny Renault Sport Twingo 133 against the Renault 5 GT Turbo. Tom finds out Vauxhall's replacement for the Vectra. Tim relives the terror of his driving test to find out why fewer people than ever are passing their test.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: What do you think is more dangerous - driving whilst being drunk, or driving whilst being tired? Tiff Needell spends a day in the pub and Quentin Willson deprives himself of sleep for 2 days.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason pits two almost identical Porsche Caymans. Jonny is enjoying some Spanish sun in the brand new Audi A5 cabriolet. Tim investigates the accuracy of the combined economy cycle. Jason helps Matthew Pinsent find his perfect car.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason pits two diesel coupes against each other. Jonny braves the freezing weather to show off three cabriolets, with a budget of just £5,000. Tom puts the Ford Fiesta against the Seat Ibiza in three tests. Tiff drives the Lamborghini Gallardo

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny and Vicki review two mighty 4x4's in one of the shows muddiest Dog Fights. Elsewhere, the team hit the road in the all-new Alpine A110 to find out what's changed since the first incarnation hit our streets back in 1961.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and Jason Plato visit the spectacular Ferrari World theme park in Abu Dhabi, Vicki pits Lotus against Porsche on a twisty track in the Netherlands.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson blast through the Pyrenees in the brand new BMW M5, Jonny Smith heads to Barcelona to drive SEAT's unbelievably cheap new city car.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell blasts through France's champagne region in Aston Martin's latest convertible, Vicki Butler-Henderson acts as umpire in a race between two England cricket stars.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson heads to Monaco in Maserati's brand new GranCabrio, Jason Plato tries to hit 200mph in the Noble M600 supercar and Tiff Needell joins Jonny Smith in attempting the impossible - a road trip in an electric car.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: We conduct a shocking 120mph crash test, pit the two most powerful Jaguars ever head to head, and get to grips with the car everyone's talking about - the Range Rover Evoque.

programme.title: Bullet Proof
programme.desc: A fatal traffic collision reveals a shocking truth, and Andy’s romance with Det. Callaghan gets complicated.

programme.title: Hot & Bothered
programme.desc: A heat wave has wreaked havoc on the city, multiplied by growing fears of a serial rapist on the loose.

programme.title: Honour Roll
programme.desc: Andy and Chris investigate a nightclub beating, but all clues point to a cop.

programme.title: Girlfriend of the Year
programme.desc: At a highway accident, Chris and Gail stumble upon a car that has a license plate matched to an Amber Alert.

programme.title: Big Nickel
programme.desc: A botched prisoner transport has Andy and Swarek in a cat-and-mouse game to catch the fugitive.

programme.title: To Serve or Protect
programme.desc: Andy’s ex-cop father has confessed that he may have committed a crime during an alcohol-induced blackout.

programme.title: Judgment Day
programme.desc: It’s time for performance assessments for the rookies as they find out the fate of their careers.

programme.title: Takedown
programme.desc: When an arrest compromises a drug bust, Andy steps up to salvage the bust by going undercover with Swarek.

programme.title: Butterflies
programme.desc: Andy's world explodes when a student is killed in a shooting, and a bullet hits Andy, lodging in her vest.

programme.title: Might Have Been
programme.desc: Andy and Gail go undercover as cocktail waitresses to clean up a drug-infested club.

programme.title: Bad Moon Rising
programme.desc: As a full moon hangs over the city, the rookies are unnerved by a series of strange occurrences.

programme.title: Heart & Sparks
programme.desc: As 15 Division recovers from the shooting of Callaghan, a series of arsons culminates in a laundromat fire.

programme.title: Stung
programme.desc: Using a car dealership, 15 Division runs a sting operation to crack down on suspects with outstanding warrants

programme.title: In Plain View
programme.desc: When an informant is murdered, 15 Division sets its sights on finding a weak link in the East Jameson gang.

programme.title: The One That Got Away
programme.desc: When a woman is attacked in the same way as a deceased cop. Callaghan is convinced that it’s the same suspect.

programme.title: Monster
programme.desc: After a seemingly drunken man collapses in the barn, 15 Division is put under quarantine.

programme.title: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Dov and Gail work together in a stake-out operation to stop an Asian gang from killing a snitch.

programme.title: Best Laid Plans
programme.desc: 15 Division’s hunt for an armed robber leads them to the scene of a horrible car accident.

programme.title: A Little Faith
programme.desc: On an undercover training exercise Traci and Andy stumble upon a woman who is about to die of an overdose.

programme.title: On the Double
programme.desc: When Gail Peck’s uniform is stolen, the rookies go after a vigilante who is impersonating a police officer.

programme.title: God's Good Grace
programme.desc: While Swarek is brutally interrogated, the rookies help Andy solve a mystery that may reveal Swarek’s location

programme.title: The First Day of the Rest of Your Life
programme.desc: When a girl vanishes from the scene of a multi-car accident, Andy connects the girl to a 7-year-old cold case.

programme.title: Class Dismissed
programme.desc: As high schools wind to a close for summer, dangerous pranks abound – including the theft of a police car.

programme.title: A Good Shoot
programme.desc: Dov Epstein happens upon a convenience store robbery-in-progress that results in him shooting a black teenager

programme.title: Girls' Night Out
programme.desc: Hell breaks loose when a carload of girls from a bachelorette party hits another vehicle, killing the driver.

programme.title: Messy Houses
programme.desc: When Andy answers a domestic disturbance call, the social worker turns out to be her estranged mother.

programme.title: Coming Home
programme.desc: A noise complaint leads Andy and Swarek to an illegal warehouse party, and to an injured John Doe.

programme.title: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: A gifted psychic (or a gifted conman) helps find the missing witness in an organized-crime case.

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: While investigating the disappearance of an escort, the officers discover a pattern of missing women.

programme.title: Out of Time
programme.desc: The officers of 15 Division are forced to release a suspected predator for lack of evidence.

programme.title: Cold Comforts
programme.desc: The officers of 15 Division are reeling in the aftermath of the unexpected death of one of their colleagues.

programme.title: The Rules
programme.desc: Staff Sergeant Frank Best decides it_s time for his officers to get back on track.

programme.title: Every Man
programme.desc: Andy and Nick investigate a torched van. It belongs a street priest who's been receiving death threats.

programme.title: I Never
programme.desc: When a child abductor escapes from an emergency hospital visit, 15 Division goes on the hunt for the criminal.

programme.title: Surprises
programme.desc: After months working undercover, Andy and Nick’s operation goes sideways when Nick - then Andy - go missing.

programme.title: Homecoming
programme.desc: On her first day back at 15 Division, Andy must work with Swarek to track down an ex-convict.

programme.title: Different, Not Better
programme.desc: Andy is partnered with Swarek’s new girlfriend, Officer Marlo Cruz.

programme.title: The Kids Are Not Alright
programme.desc: A routine highway check leads to the discovery of a teenage boy in the trunk of a car.

programme.title: Poison Pill
programme.desc: After a messy drug arrest, Andy and Marlo are quarantined together.

programme.title: Skeletons
programme.desc: There's a possible connection between a missing woman and one of the division’s most distressing cases.

programme.title: Friday the 13th
programme.desc: When human bones found in a ravine open up a 15-year-old case, Swarek reunites with his old training officer.

programme.title: For Better, for Worse
programme.desc: Things get complicated when the team gets called to a hijacked casino bus full of senior citizens.

programme.title: What I Lost
programme.desc: When Chris returns for a visit, his reunion takes a shocking turn when his son, Christian, is abducted.

programme.title: You Are Here
programme.desc: Near the end of a shift, 15 Division busts a marijuana grow-op.

programme.title: Deception
programme.desc: When a pedophile is found beaten, Andy discovers Marlo has been conducting an off-hours “investigation."

programme.title: Under Fire
programme.desc: Someone with a grudge against 15 Division opens fire on Andy and Chloe.

programme.title: You Can See the Stars
programme.desc: The officers have to piece together the truth about a past crime in order to find Oliver Shaw.

programme.title: Blink
programme.desc: Andy and Dov pull themselves together at an all-night diner, but are caught off-guard in a diner hold-up.

programme.title: All By Her Selfie
programme.desc: Oliver gets promoted to Acting Staff Sergeant, and Andy is tasked with training 15 Division’s newest rookie.

programme.title: Heart Breakers, Money Makers
programme.desc: Inspector Jarvis sends the officers to seize all “proceeds of crime” – anything purchased with illegal money.

programme.title: Wanting
programme.desc: After the discovery of an executed gang leader, 15 Division must find the killer before a gang war breaks out.

programme.title: Going Under
programme.desc: When 15 Division goes undercover at a club-land bar, Chris’s erratic behavior make Dov suspicious.

programme.title: Two Truths and a Lie
programme.desc: As the officers try to hunt down the killer of Brian Gowdy – Andy and Sam go on the road for interviews.

programme.title: Deal with the Devil
programme.desc: Oliver prepares Andy to defend herself at Duncan’s dismissal hearing, now happening two hours from now.

programme.title: Exit Strategy
programme.desc: An innocuous call to a middle-class home puts Dov and Chris in the middle of a home invasion investigation.

programme.title: Moving Day
programme.desc: 15 Division works on a program to help tenants move out of a subsidized-housing complex that’s being torn down

programme.title: Fragments
programme.desc: Andy’s former rookie, Duncan, is back on duty and looking to reconcile – something she’s not ready for yet.

programme.title: Everlasting
programme.desc: The officers work to find a bomber. But after catching him, they realize he has more targets set to explode.

programme.title: Open Windows
programme.desc: Andy is attacked by an intruder at Traci’s place and the Sex Crimes Unit steps in to take over the case.

programme.title: Perfect Family
programme.desc: Andy debates her future with Sam after learning the heart-breaking news that Marlo is pregnant with his baby.

programme.title: Uprising
programme.desc: A riot breaks out at a women’s prison while Andy, Juliet, Nick, and Gail are there to transfer prisoners.

programme.title: Letting Go
programme.desc: Nick’s estranged older brother emerges with new information on someone from their tragic past.

programme.title: A Real Gentleman
programme.desc: When Traci is a no-show for her first raid, 15 Division fears the gun dealer they’re after has kidnapped her.

programme.title: Home Run
programme.desc: After a baseball game erupts in a drive-by shooting, Gail and her brother search for the shooter.

programme.title: Best Man
programme.desc: Andy and Sam are shocked to learn that Oliver is the prime suspect in IA’s corruption investigation.

programme.title: Integrity Test
programme.desc: Andy, Dov, Gail, and Nick undertake a risky plan to prove that Commissioner Alonso Santana is corrupt.

programme.title: Ninety Degrees

programme.title: Super Duelists
programme.desc: It’s a superheroic showdown in the Synchro Dimension pitting Super Gong against his arch-nemesis, Dennis the Destroyer!

programme.title: Scream for the Green
programme.desc: Dennis and Gong are in for the ride of their lives when they’re introduced to the turbo-charged world of underground motorcycle dueling!

programme.title: Feline Frenzy
programme.desc: A suspicious shadow is trailing Yuma. It seems someone has been after Yuma, and their identity is the unassuming girl Cat-chan from Yuma's class. Yuma and Kotori fall into Cat-chan's trap. To rescue Kotori, he's going to have to Duel. Astral is cautious of the strange vibes he's getting from Cat-chan, especially with the strategy of her "Transforming Cat Deck"!

programme.title: Shark Attack
programme.desc: Yuma is reminded that his victories in his current Duels are due to Astral's help. To prove his skills, he fights Shark once more. Though Shark doesn't care to Duel again, he finally agrees when he finally reaches the end of his rope due to Yuma's constant following him around. The Duel of these two begins. Can Yuma win against Shark, who has no "Number" cards, when he himself declares he won't use his "Number" cards or take the aid of Astral!?After his Duel with Shark, Yuma Duels Tetsuo Takeda without "Numbers" and loses twenty times in a row, with Tetsuo angry because Yuma lied about not using the "Numbers" against Shark. Yuma is scolded by Astral on his immaturity. On the other hand,...

programme.title: The Pack - Part 1
programme.desc: After his Duel with Shark, Yuma Duels Tetsuo Takeda without "Numbers" and loses twenty times in a row, with Tetsuo angry because Yuma lied about not using the "Numbers" against Shark. Yuma is scolded by Astral on his immaturity. On the other hand, Shark returns to "his place" where he gets involved with a criminal network. Yuma, who knew what was going on with Shark, challenges the two strongest thugs: Rikuo and Kaio, to what Shark proposes to be a 2 on 2 "Tag-Team Duel".

programme.title: The Pack - Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma finds himself pinned down by the overwhelming power of "Number 61: Volcasaurus". To protect their precious remaining Life Points, he defends Shark at his own expense. When their opponents summon their second Number monster at that point, Astral becomes aware of the hidden mysteries underlying the Duel. In a last-ditch effort, Shark notices Yuma's passion and entrusts him with 1 card that could turn the whole Duel around!

programme.title: The Number Hunter - Part 1
programme.desc: After a series of incidents, Yuma and Astral learn of the existence of a "Number Hunter". Astral remains wary of an unseen presence, but Yuma pretends not to care. As a result, a series of strange phenomena appear around these two. Undeniably, these are the signs of the coming of the "Number Hunter" named Kaito Tenjo. At that moment, a dangerous Duel with the Numbers cards on the line begins. With Kaito's power far beyond their reckoning, what can Astral or Yuma possibly do?

programme.title: The Number Hunter - Part 2
programme.desc: In just 1 Turn, Kaito Summons 2 Numbers. Yuma attempts to resist the onslaught, but all of his monsters have been removed from the field...! Kaito, capable of even more, summons the strongest Monster to exist: "Galaxy-Eyes Photon Dragon", which has never been seen before! Yuma summons "Number 39: Utopia" to create a turnaround despite the impossible odds facing him.

programme.title: Training Days - Part 1
programme.desc: Having clearly seen Kaito's power, and how utterly hopeless they are, Yuma and Astral are keenly aware that they cannot easily recover. At that time, Yuma talks to his grandmother. She mentions a mysterious old man named Jurou at a "Duel Lodge" who owns a wooden statue of the Legendary Monster "Dark Magician", who is waiting for Yuma and his crew. Yuma makes a strong wish based on his desire to train and get better!

programme.title: Training Days - Part 2
programme.desc: It's a Duel against Jurou's former disciple, Yamikawa! Yamikawa draws his Ninja monsters, pinning Yuma down, but believing in the power of his friends, Yuma must continue this battle to the Death! But, Yamikawa summons his Trump Card, the Number Monster "Armed Ninja - Crimson Shadow"! However, Yuma continues to believe in the power of his friends, but can this possibly lead him to win the Duel!?

programme.title: It's in the Cards - Part 1
programme.desc: Kotori and her friends, who are interested in the Number cards, plus Astral, form the "Number Club". To get more info about the Numbers, they visit the home of a fortuneteller, but the fortuneteller is under the orders of Kaito to collect the Number Cards! When the fortuneteller, Jin, kidnaps Kotori and the rest, Yuma and Astral come to the rescue, but the memory of their Duel with Kaito comes back, the visions of which continue to haunt them!

programme.title: It's in the Cards - Part 2
programme.desc: To save Kotori and the rest, Yuma continues to fight with Jin over the Numbers. Yuma's Life Points continue to fall, putting the fate of Kotori and the rest in a perilous situation, as Jin worsens things by summoning a second Numbers. In the midst of such a terrible pinch, Astral finds himself scared by Kaito's looming shadow, but when he sees Yuma who refuses to give up, he steps back up to the fight. With the feelings of these two guys, "Utopia" obtains a new power!
