programme.title: Chain Game
programme.desc: Barrett has chained up Yuya and his monsters! Can Yuya break his shackles before Barrett breaks away with Celina?

programme.title: Tragic Reunion
programme.desc: Yuya’s battle with Barrett comes to a shocking conclusion when a mind-controlled madman drops into their duel!

programme.title: Road Rage - Part 1
programme.desc: It’s Jack’s most dangerous duel ever as he takes on Roget’s maniacal minion - Sergey!

programme.title: Road Rage - Part 2
programme.desc: Can Jack Atlas best Sergey, when Sergey combines the best of man and machine?

programme.title: Martial Flaw
programme.desc: Roget declares himself leader of New Domino City! Can the Lancers overthrow this madman, or will Roget’s Sector Security end any chances they have?

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: The Friendship Cup finale is finally here! Jack and Yuya square off to see who will become New Domino City’s newest champion!

programme.title: Making it Mine
programme.desc: Jack pushes Yuya to his limits in the Friendship Cup finale! Does Yuya have the dueltaining skills to dethrone the Master of Faster, or will Jack’s rule reign supreme?

programme.title: Friendship Finale
programme.desc: With the City on the edge of their seats, a new champion is about to be crowned! But who will sit in the winner’s circle: Yuya or Jack?

programme.title: A Vicious Cycle
programme.desc: The Friendship Cup may be over, but trouble sure isn’t! Roget is planning to take Zuzu to Duel Academy!

programme.title: A Warlike Welcome
programme.desc: Yuya reaches a new place - Heartland City, the hometown of Yuto and Shay in the Xyz Dimension along with Sylvio and Gong. There they meet Duel Academy soldiers and an independent warrior from that dimension.

programme.title: The Edge of the World
programme.desc: Yuma misplaces the the Emperor's Key that was an important momento from his parents. He and Astral look high and low for it, but they just can't seem to find it. While they look, Astral is curious as to how the Emperor's Key is related to Yuma's father. Yuma starts talking about various memories from his childhood that he remembers about his dad. Yuma's Never-Give-Up Spirit "Kattobingu" was born from a promise he made with his father.

programme.title: Roots of the Problem
programme.desc: Yuma safely recovers "Number 96: Black Mist" from a man. Tetsuo, who witnessed the Duel, takes note that Yuma seems suddenly more brutal in his strategy, and ends up in a fight with him. Not having reconciled in over 2 days, suddenly Number 96 swallows Yuma and Astral up!! To rescue Yuma and Astral from Number 96, Tetsuo fights the Numbers for the first time!

programme.title: Battle with the Bot
programme.desc: As they head home from class, Yuma and his friends meet Lilly who becomes their friend. However, after the robot is reprogrammed to its former self, Yuma duels Lilly in order to help regain her memories.

programme.title: The Shark Hunter
programme.desc: In order to protect Yuma's Key from Kite, Shark faces him in a Duel.

programme.title: Hunting Down the Hunter - Part 1
programme.desc: While Yuma seeks for his Key, Astral duels against Kite to defend the Number cards he possesses.

programme.title: Hunting Down the Hunter - Part 2
programme.desc: Despite being unable to fight against the immense power of Galaxy-Eyes Photon Dragon, Astral, his resolve stern due to Feeling the Flow, continues a desperate combo of Offense and Defense. But when he finally gives up against Kite who keeps attacking him over and over, Yuma appears and the mysterious ZEXAL power activates...

programme.title: Frozen in Time
programme.desc: One morning, Yuma heads to school, and while talking to his friends, time stops. He sees three suns shining in the sky. Together with Astral, they both shiver from a fear they do not understand, causing Yuma to run off to find out what possibly could have happened. At that time, Kite, using Dr. Faker's technology, retraces Astral's memories and invites Yuma to the World Duel Carnival.

programme.title: Let the Duels Begin
programme.desc: The World Duel Carnival, where Duelists from around the world will wage heated battles, is swiftly approaching. Yuma, seeking to fulfill his dream of becoming "Duel Champion", excitedly rushes to the tournament. But what will Yuma do when he has no Heart Pieces, which serve as the proof of participation for the WDC? Meanwhile, Mr. Heartland and Kite make their preparations to gather the Numbers that are likely to assemble before them in this tournament.

programme.title: A Team Performance
programme.desc: Yuma's first opponent in the World Duel Carnival is the soccer kid, Striker. Striker transforms the surrounding stadium with his Field Spell Card, as the Duel kicks off. With his "Offside Trap", Striker brilliantly seals Yuma's strategies, while his teammate monsters use teamwork to frantically keep beating Yuma up with a combo of offense and defense and with such sheer strength, it seems as if Striker's victory is decided...

programme.title: Heavy Metal
programme.desc: While looking for an opponent to Duel, Yuma meets a boy named Cody, who loves construction equipment, at a construction site. Yuma, interested in the construction equipment Deck Cody uses, challenges him to a Duel. However, Cody Xyz Summons his "Digvorzhak, King of Heavy Industry".

programme.title: Realm of The Cipher Dragon
programme.desc: Gongenzaka and Sawatari fight against the mysterious Kaito, who believes them to be agents of Academia. As he summons his fearsome Galaxy Eyes Cipher Dragon, Yuto notes that something has changed in Kaito.

programme.title: Rush For Revenge
programme.desc: Kaito begins a merciless assault against Yuya with his powerful Galaxy Eyes deck. With Yuto's spirit on his side, Yuya tries to match Kaito's indomitable spirit with both Odd Eyes Pendulum Dragon and Dark Rebellion Xyz Dragon.

programme.title: Rise of the Resistance
programme.desc: Yuya and the others meet the Xyz Resistance, who discuss how Heartland fell to ruin and Yusho's mysterious connection to them. Elsewhere, in the Fusion Dimension, Yuzu flees Academia soldiers when someone unexpected comes to her rescue.

programme.title: Rumble in the Rubble
programme.desc: Yusho explains what happened during his disappearance to Yuzu while in the Fusion Dimension. Back in Heartland, Yuya comes across an angry youth with a grudge against his Dueltaining style as Yuto refuses to stand by any longer.

programme.title: Fighting For Friendship
programme.desc: Shun is determined to convince Kaito to rejoin the Resistance despite Kaito's adamant refusal. As the former friends cannot convince each other either way, they decide all they can do is fight against each other.

programme.title: Fighting For Friendship
programme.desc: Shun is determined to convince Kaito to rejoin the Resistance despite Kaito's adamant refusal. As the former friends cannot convince each other either way, they decide all they can do is fight against each other.

programme.title: An Academic Test
programme.desc: Yusho reveals that three years ago he learned of the Arc Area Project and Academia's machinations, going on a journey to stop Leo's plans. Yuri arrives at the You Show Duel School to stamp out the resistance against Academia.

programme.title: Belles and Whistles
programme.desc: Allen and Sayaka try to fight Kaito only to end up facing Grace and Gloria Tyler, two of Academia's strongest enforcers. Having no choice but to fight, they face off against the Tyler's Amazoness deck.

programme.title: Twins with ‘Tude
programme.desc: As Sawatari and Gongenzaka both fail to defeat the Tyler sisters, Yuya and Shun arrive to meet their challenge. In the face of their near perfect combo, Yuya must not give into his rage and defeat his powerful foes.

programme.title: Twins with ‘Tude
programme.desc: As Sawatari and Gongenzaka both fail to defeat the Tyler sisters, Yuya and Shun arrive to meet their challenge. In the face of their near perfect combo, Yuya must not give into his rage and defeat his powerful foes.

programme.title: Surprise Showing
programme.desc: Yuya and the others try to return to the Resistance base when they are attacked by the Obelisk Force. They try to face the power of the Obelisk Force when Shun becomes gravely injured during the battles.

programme.title: Fenced In
programme.desc: Academia's enforcer Edo Phoenix challenges Yuya to a rematch. Torn between his allegiance to the Professor and his spirit of Dueltaining, a confused Edo is determined to crush Yuya and the ghost of Yusho that haunts him.

programme.title: Last Laugh
programme.desc: As their duel goes on, Edo only becomes more conflicted of where his allegiances lie. Seeing Edo suffer, Yuya is determined to remind him how fun dueling can be and begins his greatest Dueltaining performance yet.

programme.title: Hat Trick
programme.desc: Convincing Edo, the Tyler twins, and the rest of the forces in Heartland to join their side, Yuya and the other Lancers prepare to head to the Fusion Dimension to find their friends and restore everyone who has been turned into a card.

programme.title: Joy of Revenge
programme.desc: Yuya encounters his old foe from the Junior Youth Championship, Kachidoki. Kachidoki continues to use violent tactics and powerful Fusions in his Action Duels as Yuya tries to return a smile to his heart.

programme.title: All Duel Hands on Deck
programme.desc: Yuya and co board a ship to Duel Academy when Dennis catches up to them, aiming to defeat Yusho once and for all. A still vengeful Kaito meets Dennis's challenge as the two unleash their greatest monsters.

programme.title: Shiver Me Lancers
programme.desc: Serena, who appeared before the Lancers, suddenly betrays them and captures Yuzu while Yuya is forced to fight Captain Solo. Caught between useless cards and Solo's lock deck, things seem hopeless when more allies suddenly arrive.

programme.title: A Towering Achievement
programme.desc: Yugo meets with up the others and agree to work together against Academia. Yugo and Kaito head to the towers where Rin and Ruri are being held captive, only to face the guardians Apollo and Diana.

programme.title: Grip of the Parasite
programme.desc: The Doctor has brainwashed Ruri and Rin, leading them to fight against Yugo and Kaito. Meanwhile, Reiji recounts how all of Yuya's counterparts as well as all the bracelet girls are part of Leo's ultimate plan: Revival Zero.

programme.title: Survival Of The Fittest
programme.desc: Yuya and the Lancers finally make it the Academy, but they are captured and thrown into a wild battle royale against the Obelisk Force. However, a mysterious enemy in the royale begins wiping out friend and foe alike.

programme.title: Family Face Off
programme.desc: Allie is looking to make a big splash at the Arc League Championship, but she soon finds herself in over her head! Can Allie's deck of fishy friends turn the tides, or will her mysterious opponent sink her chances of winning?

programme.title: The Battle Beast
programme.desc: The wild duelist known as Battle Beast crushes his fellow Academy students and even turns Crow and Tsukikage into cards. Yuya and Gongenzaka arrive to face the challenge of their insane foe.

programme.title: Taming of The BB
programme.desc: Jack appears out of nowhere and joins Yuya in fighting against Battle Beast. Battle Beast's instructor, Sanders, joins in the duel as well to show the power and glory of the Academy to the Lancers.

programme.title: Show of Nature
programme.desc: Battle Beast continues his rampage against friend and foe alike. Sensing nothing but rage and anger in Battle Beast's heart, Yuya is determined to show him how fun dueling can actually be and aims to purge his demons.

programme.title: 123 Fusion Destruction
programme.desc: Asuka stays behind to fight Yuri while Sora and the others go on ahead. Yuri uses a different deck and fights Asuka, who tries to reach out a helping hand to Yuri. That's when Yuri reveals the real reason why he does what he does.

programme.title: Parasite Seeing
programme.desc: Yuya comes across Ruri, who is still under the control of the Doctor's parasites. Yuya attempts to fight off Ruri, made harder when Serena joins the fight. Yuto decides to take control and face the two girls.

programme.title: Rise Of The Parasites
programme.desc: Yuya and Yuto are struggling in their battle against Ruri and Serena and their Parasite Queen. The Doctor attempts to take control of Yuya using a parasite as well, but that only awakens the rage inside of Yuya once again.

programme.title: An Evil Ascends
programme.desc: Leo Akaba reveals to Yusho Sakaki how the four dimensions came to be.

programme.title: Revival Zero
programme.desc: Leo continues his story about how Zarc destroyed the original world. Leo's daughter Ray used four cards to stop Zarc and split the world into the four current worlds. He then reveals the true nature of Yuya, Yuzu, and the Arc Area Project.

programme.title: What Lurks Beneath
programme.desc: Leo begins his final plan to fuse the dimensions and revive his daughter Ray. Reiji and Yuya team up to take down Leo, with Yuya resolving not to let Zarc be revived. Yusho realizes that even this is part of a larger enemy's plan.

programme.title: A Duel Within
programme.desc: Leo's plan gets further and further to completion, which causes the evil inside of Yuya to emerge once more. Yusho stops the duel and realizes that Zarc's influence is hovering over everything, including Yuya's other counterparts.

programme.title: Duel Interrupted
programme.desc: Yugo and Yuri being their duel, with Zarc's shared influence forcing them into battle. To stop Zarc's revival, Kaito and Edo join the battle as well to hold back Yuri's powerful Fusion Dragon.

programme.title: Sibling Standoff
programme.desc: While Yuri and Yugo continue their savage battle, Reira starts hearing the voice of Ray. Aiming to make sure Ray is revived, Reira stands against Reiji and the siblings begin a duel with each other.

programme.title: Sleight of Hands
programme.desc: Reiji manages to defeat Reira, continuing on to fight Leo. Elsewhere, Yuri absorbs Yugo and aims to defeat Yuya so that Zarc can be completed. Yusho stands in for his son to fight the depraved youth instead.

programme.title: A Father's Finale
programme.desc: Yusho's advanced Dueltaining manages to push Yuri into a corner and bring Yuya back to his old self. But Yuri is determined to complete Zarc's revival and has one nasty surprise in store for Yusho.

programme.title: Relentless
programme.desc: Seeing his father carded in front of his eyes, Yuya's rage reaches a boiling point as he accepts Yuri's challenge. But not only does he have to contend with Yugo and Yuri's dragons, but Zarc's ever growing influence over him.

programme.title: Time to Reunite!
programme.desc: The four dimensions start to fuse together as Yuya continues to struggle against Yuri. Forced to discard his trump card, things seem hopeless. Yuya's friends then arrive to encourage him to keep fighting no matter what.

programme.title: A Most Brutal Duel
programme.desc: Yuya absorbs all of his counterparts and reclaimed his true form as Supreme King Z-ARC. Starting to lay waste to the Fusion Dimension, Sora and Edo challenge Zarc to try and reach out to Yuya's spirit.

programme.title: A Dark Summoning
programme.desc: The four dimensions continue to unite as Zarc effortlessly crushes Sora and Edo. Kaito and Shun continue the fight against Zarc while people from Heartland and Neo Domino City start appearing in the Fusion Dimension.

programme.title: Master of Disaster
programme.desc: Gongenzaka and Jack fight against Zarc next, trying their best to reach out to Yuya's soul buried in Zarc's darkness. A revived Crow and Sawatari decide to join in when Zarc's Supreme King Dragons swarm the field.

programme.title: Clash Talk
programme.desc: Crow notices that Zarc is starting to lose his composure, leading him and Sawatari to up their game against Zarc's dragons. As dimensional integration is getting closer to completion, Reiji tries to convince his dad to stop Zarc.

programme.title: A Ray of Hope
programme.desc: Ray's soul possesses Reira so she can battle against Zarc alongside Reiji. Zarc boasts that he is the creator of Pendulum Summon, but Ray is determined to stop him once and for all using the four natural energy cards.

programme.title: Swinging Back into Action
programme.desc: Things have seemingly returned to normal in the Pendulum Dimension, but Yuya gets the feeling that something is missing. Reiji has him duel against Tsukikage to restore his memories and make him finish the Lancer's goal for good.

programme.title: Deja Duel
programme.desc: The battle royale continues. As Yuya keeps fighting, his memories start flooding back to him. Yuzu's dad suddenly remembers too as the rest of the world slowly begins to remember the Lancers and the battle against Zarc.

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: Anna Kaboom attempts to kill Yuma with a cannon. He negotiates with her and they Duel instead so that Anna can try to take her revenge. Their past history is not what it initially seems.

programme.title: No Tomato
programme.desc: Tombo Tillbitty Duels people, defeating them with his "Basket Rule" and takes their Heart Pieces. Dextra and Nistro appear near one of the defeated Duelists. They see he has vegetables stuffed in his mouth, and Dextra sees blood on his shirt. Dextra inspects closer, and licks it up, telling the disgusted Nistro it's just tomato juice.

programme.title: Life Is a Carnival - Part 1
programme.desc: Charlie McCay steals "Number 7: Lucky Straight" from a gallery. Kari, who has past history with Charlie, sends Yuma after him. He and Astral witness the power of the "Lucky Straight" when Charlie performs a One Turn Kill on a World Duel Carnival competitor. Charlie makes his escape, stealing more cards in the process, including one of Yuma's "Numbers".

programme.title: Life Is a Carnival - Part 2
programme.desc: Charlie McCay escapes on the single-track railroad and Yuma starts the Duel. But Charlie's "Number 7: Lucky Straight" possesses amazing luck. If he hits the jackpot by rolling the dice, then Charlie's Life Points will become 100,000. On the verge of giving up when all of his attempts to stop that strong luck become fruitless, Yuma discovers an unexpected strategy.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven

programme.title: Highway to Heaven

programme.desc: Alkuperäisen Kansainyhteisön tiedemies ilmestyy, kiinni ajan silmukassa.

programme.desc: Löydetään kristalli, joka voi palauttaa Andromedan voiman, mutta saadakseen sen Dylanin on työskenneltävä kaivoksen omistajalle.

programme.desc: Seefrasta löydetään tunneleita, joiden kautta voi päästä kahdeksalle muulle Seefra-planeetalle.

programme.desc: Kun vanha mies tapetaan, Beka, Rhade ja Harper ovat pää epäiltyjä ja joutuvat oikeuteen.

programme.desc: Rhade johtaa kapinallisia taistelussa Seefra-5:n sotapäällikköä vastaan.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka ja Rhade joutuvat koetukselle, joka joko antaa heille suuren rikkauden tai ajaa heidät hulluuteen.

programme.desc: Harper löytää ohjelman, joka voi tuhota kahdeksan Seefra-planeettaa ja tappaa miljoonia ihmisiä.

programme.desc: Samalla kun Harper yrittää pelastaa Seefra-järjestelmän, vakooja hiipii Andromedalle ja hyökkää Bekan kimppuun.

programme.desc: Seefran vilkkuva aurinko yritetään korjata, mutta Trance korvataan kaksoisolennolla.

programme.desc: Dylan, Rhade ja Beka työskentelevät yhdessä pelastaakseen Trancen Methus-2:lta ja Harperin kenraali Burmalta.

programme.title: Killer Caliber 32
programme.desc: Hired gun Silver kills a masked gang’s seven members one by one, using silver bullets and his own code of justice. Between poker games and saloon girls, his mission leads to the dramatic unmasking of the gang’s ruthless leader. Silver’s style and honor make him a deadly force in this action-packed tale.

programme.title: The Godless Ones
programme.desc: An outlaw and a bounty hunter are searching for Mexican bandit Corbancho, who is running the El Paso area, and has also robbed the Bank of Tuscon of $400,000.

programme.title: Bounty Hunter in Trinity
programme.desc: The townsfolk of Trinity decide to hire a notorious bounty hunter to protect them from a fierce band of Mexican outlaws who are terrorizing the area.

programme.title: Requiescant
programme.desc: The adopted son of a preacher comes upon a village that is under the thumb of a deranged ex-Confederate officer, who is - among other things - stealing land from the locals with phony land grants.

programme.title: The Great Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: A blind man wants to get his mitts on a crooks' gold. He can't do it alone, so he hires the quartet of soldiers-of-fortune to help him.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Jesse James' Women
programme.desc: Jesse James is involved with four women: a saloon keeper, a banker’s daughter, a singer and a cattle baroness. Their ties, often driven by gain, ignite rivalry and tension.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - The Wild One
programme.desc: A Native American doctor finds himself the victim of discrimination when he sets up his practice in a new settlement.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Abilene Town
programme.desc: When an uneasy truce between cattlemen and homesteaders is broken in Abilene, Texas, Marshall Dan Mitchell (Randolph Scott) must resolve the conflict as he tries to manage the two women in his life.

programme.title: Cimarron Strip
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Cimarron Strip - The Roarer
programme.desc: After a comrade’s death, a grief-stricken cavalry sergeant lashes out, killing a citizen and fleeing justice. Marshal Crown must track him down before the town takes revenge.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Jesse James Meets Frankenstein
programme.desc: Jesse James meets Baron Frankenstein’s granddaughter, who keeps the monster’s brain and seeks a new body in Jesse’s cohort, leading to a showdown between gunslinger and creature.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - Delaware Hoax
programme.desc: The Delaware tribe is framed for a murder they didn't commit and they're ready to go to war against the white settlers. Hawkeye learns that a scheming land speculator is to blame and goes undercover to bring justice.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Daniel Boone - Trail Blazer
programme.desc: Legendary frontiersman Daniel Boone (Bruce Bennett) builds a home in Kentucky’s 18th-century wilderness, defending Boonesborough settlers from Shawnee raids and British attacks.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - Franklin Story
programme.desc: When the corrupt authorities of a small town are guilty of numerous crimes, Hawkeye calls on his friend Ben Franklin to prosecute them to the full extent of the law.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Joshua
programme.desc: When a black cavalryman returns home from the Civil War to find his mother murdered, he sets out on the trail of her killers in search of revenge.

programme.title: Samantha
programme.desc: An extranged couple decide to get together, along with their new partners, to discuss custody and well-being of the estranged couple's daughter, samantha. Things start to go awry as old wounds are reopened and old feelings, good and bad start to resurface.

programme.title: The Missing Heirloom
programme.desc: A very expensive family heirloom goes missing and now Detective Lazarus must find it before he loses his own life.

programme.title: I Love My Neighbour - Ep7
programme.desc: Comedy that shows the life, misunderstandings, gossip and conflicts of a group of neighbours who have their differences and deep down cannot stand each other.

programme.title: I Love My Neighbour - Ep8
programme.desc: Comedy that shows the life, misunderstandings, gossip and conflicts of a group of neighbours who have their differences and deep down cannot stand each other.

programme.title: A Dead Man's Tale
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A “responsible” married man was supposedly killed by his side chick in a hotel room while having fun. The late man’s children are determined to get justice for their father’s death, but their mother is bent on letting the suspected murderer go scott-free.

programme.title: Mad Woman
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Maria became the new maid for a woman to whom she had looked up. Maria expected to find an upstanding, perfect family; instead, she discovered that the woman whom she'd regarded highly was an abusive and possessive wife and a demon in disguise.

programme.title: Fashion Insider - Omone Faith
programme.desc: Discover new designers, trends, styles, and more at Fashion Insider. Elileojo Achebo provides you with the opportunity to gain firsthand knowledge of the African stylists of the moment.

programme.title: Fashion Insider - Akin Faminu
programme.desc: Entertainment show that focuses on celebrities fashion styles on red carpet events and on social media.

programme.title: Finding Faith
programme.desc: Two couples with two different life challenges are tested in their marriages and their faith in God. They they have to dig deeper into their strength to stay on the right path when faced with a so-called 'Man Of God'.

programme.title: Frenemy
programme.desc: In the process of divorcing her husband, Peggy moves out of the house to start a new life and, hopefully, to forget all about the opposite gender, but life has other plans for her.

programme.title: The Underhand
programme.desc: A woman bound by naivety and traditions continues to defend her husband even when he does all manner of evil to her.

programme.title: Best Friends
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Depressed after getting past for a promotion, Dami gets drunk and ends up in bed with Oduva, the borfriend of her best friend, Ruth, who is a chronic cheat. Ashamed of her actions, she seeks refuge with Richard and they join forces to take down Oduva, after Ruth realises there is something wrong with Oduva.

programme.desc: A woman is regarded as a spinster after a series of failed romances and feeling pressure from all around her to settle down with the next man that comes along.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: With the help of Annie and Lofty, Clay Griffin, a lawman whose eyesight is deteriorating, confronts Johnny Storm and the Murdocks after they are involved in a robbery. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook suspect that Carpenter is being bamboozled by the Mohawk guide helping him establish a new settlement. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Tensions rise when a Tuscarawas man tries to incite war against the settlers. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After the Virginia City bank is robbed by an outlaw gang, the gangs youngest member gets a job on the Ponderosa. Initially welcomed, Little Joe becomes suspicious of Ponderosas newest member.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: New Mexico
programme.desc: What happens when Abraham Lincoln himself comes to New Mexico to discuss a treaty with Native American chief Acoma (Ted de Corsia)? Can the hotbed of emotions be quieted by cavalry Captain Hunt (Lew Ayres)? Or will the Captains superiors insist on provoking with the native tribe? Find out what happens in this fictional tale packed with action from 1951!

programme.title: Texas Brooklyn and Heaven
programme.desc: When Eddie Tayloe (Guy Madison, 5 Against the House) receives $6,000 from his grandfather, he decides to leave his drab newspaper job and move to New York. His dream is to have a play produced on Broadway. Along the way he picks up a pretty hitchhiker (Diana Lynn, The Miracle of Morgan's Creek) who is also leaving her own dreary life for a shot at New York. Unfortunately, they find that the Big Apple is a hard place to make a living. But it's also a city where circumstances keep bringing them together!

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: A widow with a young daughter travels to a ranch in Wyoming to manage the household of a rancher. After a while the man and woman develop a relationship that leads to a marriage. But life in the harsh place takes its toll.

programme.title: The Hanged Man
programme.desc: After a condemned gunfighter (Steve Forrest) survives his own hanging, he helps a young widow stop a pitiless land baron from taking her ranch. This television feature boasts a strong cast of recognizable characters, including Will Geer, Sharon Acker, Dean Jagger, BarBara Luna, and Cameron Mitchell. Director Michael Caffey would go on to work on such hit shows as Barnaby Jones and MacGyver. Also, look for John Mitchum, younger brother of Robert, in a small role. This movie originally aired on ABC-TV and was considered the pilot for a possible series. Writer/producer Andrew Fenady was behind several opular TV shows such as Branded and The Rebel, as well as the 1970 John Wayne feature, Chisum.

programme.title: Sagebrush Trail
programme.desc: John Wayne plays a man wrongly convicted of murder in this exciting western drama from Lone Star Pictures. You'll enjoy plenty of gun action and thundering hoofbeats as he escapes from jail and then joins a gang, hoping to find the real killer! Director Armand Schaefer (The Miracle Rider, The Lost Jungle) whips up some fine performances from a cast of B-movie favorites, including Lane Chandler (Samson and Delilah) and the great stunt rider, Yakima Canutt. And of course, the film features plenty of fight scenes, made memorable by John Wayne's big swinging' right fist! For film buffs: This was one of 11 films Wayne starred in that year, making 1933 one of the busiest years of Wayne's...

programme.title: Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: The sons of a Colorado cattle baron, one biological and the other adopted, resent one another and fight for control of their father's cattle empire.

programme.title: Land of Hunted Men
programme.desc: A band of outlaws is terrorizing a town in the West. Leave it to Ray Crash Corrigan and his Range Busters to ride in and save the day. This film marked the return of Corrigan to the famous series; he had appeared in the first sixteen movies but left for a brief hiatus following 1942's ARIZONA STAGECOACH. This was the 21st of 24 movies in the Range Busters series. Produced between 1940-1943, the Range Busters were a huge financial success for Monogram Pictures.

programme.title: Last of the Clintons
programme.desc: Icon of early talking pictures, Harry Carey (Red River), portrays the rugged Trigger Carson, a noble cowboy who infiltrates an outlaw gang in order to expose their rackets. Ordered to kidnap a young girl, his identity is revealed and he is forced to fight his way out of the gang and back to safety. Already 56 by the time he signed on to do this and a series of Westerns for Berke Productions, the stately Carrey (who netted an Oscar nomination four years later) was widely lauded at the time for adding a great deal of maturity and respectability due to his undeniable presence and strong performances.
